attributes.action: Stop University tuition fees from going any higher than £9,000
attributes.additional_details:
Fewer people, who may have wanted to go to university, will now not be able to go because of the already ridiculously high tuition fees that are due to rise even higher. 

In 2018, the government has announced university tuition fees will rise to over £9,500
attributes.background: University tuition fees shouldn't go any higher than £9000 because it deters less well off people from getting a higher education, which affects our future job prospects.

rejection.details:
We think that your petition is similar to the following petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/162493

You might want to consider supporting this petition.
